text: Edward Buxton may refer to: *Sir Edward Buxton, 2nd Baronet (1812–1858), Member of Parliament for Essex South *Edward Buxton (conservationist) (1840–1924), his son, Member of Parliament for Walthamstow 1885–1886 and a conservationist *G. Edward Buxton Jr. (1880–1949), United States Army officer
title: Edward Buxton
